description:
Track changes to individual fields within entities, showing who changed what and when. Allow users to rollback specific field changes without reverting entire entity versions. Display a timeline of field modifications with before/after comparisons.

**Rationale:** While document version comparison exists, granular field-level history helps users understand incremental changes to entities like persons, engagements, or commitments. This is essential for compliance, dispute resolution, and understanding data evolution in government/legal contexts.
title: Field-Level Edit History and Rollback
